page.title: 17Adopt-a-Gran in St.Helens
page.content: Our school, Parish C.E. Primary, have a scheme to help the old people who live in the district.The children of the fourth year go out in pairs to visit one of the local 'grans'. My 'gran' lives in Gleave Street. When we get to her house she invites us in and we sit down and have a cup of tea and a biscuit. We chat about all kinds of things. Sometimes on a Wednesday the 'grans' come in to school.They can all meet and have a chat with each other over a cup of tea. When the scheme started we were entered into a competition for the B.B.C. Look Northwest Trophy. We won the competition and we were on the television and in the local newspapers.
